headline: Pryzm Raises $12M Led by Andreessen Horowitz to Transform Federal Procurement with AI
summary: Pryzm today announced a $12.2 million seed funding round led by Andreessen Horowitz's (a16z) American Dynamism fund, with participation from existing investors XYZ Venture Capital, Amplify.LA, and Forum Ventures. The raise advances Pryzm's mission to modernize how the federal government discovers, evaluates, and acquires emerging technology, while giving industry a clearer, faster path to identify opportunities, shape demand and compete on capability.

headline: TekStream Announces Strategic Leadership Hire Taylor Morgan as Chief Solutions Officer
summary: TekStream, a digital resilience company that helps organizations modernize, secure and optimize their digital environments, announced today that Taylor Morgan has joined the company as the Chief Solutions Officer. In this role, Morgan will help lead the next stage of the company's cybersecurity and technology strategy, expand managed security capabilities, and drive long-term growth and innovation.

raw.headline: TekStream Announces Strategic Leadership Hire Taylor Morgan as Chief Solutions Officer

headline: High Growth Tech Stocks to Watch in US December 2025
summary: As the U.S. stock market navigates a week marked by anticipation of the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision, major indices such as the S&P 500 have recently pulled back from record highs, reflecting investor caution amidst economic uncertainty. In this context, identifying high-growth tech stocks requires a focus on companies with robust innovation strategies and adaptability to changing market dynamics, which can potentially thrive even in volatile environments.

raw.headline: High Growth Tech Stocks to Watch in US December 2025
raw.summary: As the U.S. stock market navigates a week marked by anticipation of the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision, major indices such as the S&P 500 have recently pulled back from record highs, reflecting investor caution amidst economic uncertainty. In this context, identifying high-growth tech stocks requires a focus on companies with robust innovation strategies and adaptability to changing market dynamics, which can potentially thrive even in volatile environments.

headline: Palantir (PLTR): Evaluating Valuation After New AI Partnerships and the Launch of Chain Reaction Platform
summary: Palantir Technologies (PLTR) just stacked several high profile announcements, from its real time rodeo AI project with Teton Ridge and Nvidia to the new Chain Reaction infrastructure platform, reinforcing the stock’s evolving commercial growth story. See our latest analysis for Palantir Technologies. Those announcements are landing against a backdrop of strong momentum, with Palantir’s share price up sharply this year and a three year total shareholder return above 2,300 percent signaling how...
